p: Several other polyphenol-rich by-products are known, such as Cocoa shell, the waste of chocolate production, which contains catechin, epicatechin, and gallic acid [ 96]; the waste of black tea, which shows antioxidant and antimicrobial activity [ 97]; melon peels, which contain a great amount of polyphenols [ 98]; larch bark, a source of proanthocyanidin B7, a well-known antioxidant [ 99]; and maize bran containing ferulic acid [ 100].
